textAfterTable: Game Overview Vanguard Princess is a fighting game developed by Tomoaki Sugeno and released on Microsoft Windows. Vanguard Princess is a 2D fighting game that features an all-female cast each with their own unique fighting style. Choose from ten girls with unique fighting skills and pair them with a powerful partner to form an unstoppable team. Government experiments on a young girl triggered a cosmic shock wave that gifted many young girls with mystical powers. She re-emerges into the world and vows to destroy all of mankind in an act of revenge. A brave group of girls who embraced their powers head to the battlefield to confront her; not just for the sake of the world, but to pursue their own personal motives and dreams.  Vanguard Princess Wiki on Gamewise Overview Release Dates Credits Walkthrough Achievements Cheats Discussion Similar Games Street Fighter IV (0.11m) Street Fighter X Tekken (0.02m) BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger (0.01m) Mortal Kombat X (0.01m)
